      • insert

        public void insert(java.lang.String text,
          int pos)
        Insert a string at a given position. Use substring to get html document with the inserted text.
        Parameters:
        text - text to insert, should not include tags.
        pos -

      • substring

        public java.lang.String substring(int beginPos,
                         int endPos)
        Get substring of html document text, which will then include html tags/attributes. example: if the substring(1,3) for html doc 'abced' will return 'bc'
